name: Murloc RPG Remaster
description:
The Murloc RPG Remaster

With the launch of the classic world of warcraft so comes the return of Murk the true hero of all Azeroth!

NOTE: This game is still in development and might contain bugs! If you find one, post it on the reddit page (Link in-game)

Background:

From an early age, I was enthralled by both world of wow and the golden age of flash games so it was pretty sad that the original game was never truly completed. Now being trained in the dark arts of computer programing I have taken up the task of bringing this game to a modern audience.  Currently, all of the "first" game has been completed with a working and stable build for Android devices!

Features:

  • Hours of nostalgic gameplay
  • 20 Talents
  • 50 + Classic wow items ( with a bunch of new ones added in)
  • Explore Camp Brakil, Elwyin Forest and visit the mysterious Darkmoon Faire
  • Complete Quests, level up and become the champion of the Murlocs!

Current Plans:

  • I'd love to eventually get a IOS build complete
  • With the game finally in 1.00 release, adding the strangle thorn vale content is my next main priority!
  • Eventually expanding the game past its original scope adding new mobs, bosses, zones and talents!
